title: Mahesh Raveendranatha Panicker | Web Directory | Singapore Institute of Technology

meta.description: 16+ years of post PhD experience in research and development of signal/image/video processing algorithms for bio-medical and industrial applications with 8+ years in industry (ex GE and Samsung). Senior Member with IEEE, Six Sigma Green Belt certified and a TRIZ practitioner. Published research findings in 26 international journals, 70 international conferences and 11 patents. Associate Editor - Springer Circuits Systems and Signal Processing  Consultant to GE Healthcare Bangalore, Samsung Research Institute Bangalore, VisiConsult Inc. Recipient of Early Career Research Award from Science and Engineering Research Board, Government of India in 2019.  Won General Electric (GE) wide technical excellence awards in 2013 and 2015. Won silver award for ten or more patents with GE Education Ph.D., 2009 School of Computer Engineering, Nanyang Technological University (NTU), Singapore Dissertation topic: Reconfigurable low complexity digital filter banks for software radio receivers Link: https://www.doi.org/10.32657/10356/47469 Advisor: Professor Vinod Achutavarrier Prasad B. Tech., 2003 (First Rank in the University) Department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology (Govt. Engineering College), Mahatma Gandhi University, Kerala, India Dissertation topic: Microprocessor based Autonomous Robot Advisor: Professor Dinesh Gopinath Professional Experience Total Work Experience – 16 years (Teaching: 6 years, Industry: 8 years, Post Doctoral: 2 years) Dec 2023 - Till Now Singapore Institute of Technology Associate Professor, Infocomm Technology Cluster Nov 2021 – Dec 2023 Indian Institute of Technology, Palakkad Associate Professor, Department of Electrical Engineering Oct 2021 – Aug 2023 Indian Institute of Technology, Palakkad Head of the Department, Electrical Engineering June 2018 – Nov 2021 Indian Institute of Technology, Palakkad Assistant Professor, Electrical Engineering May 2017 – May 2018 Samsung Research Institute, Bangalore, India Senior Chief Engineer, Ultrasound Systems, Healthcare and Medical Equipments (HME) Aug 2010 – April 2017 GE Global Research, Bangalore, India Lead Engineer at Software Sciences and Analytics Research Aug 2008 – Jul 2010 Nanyang Technological University, Singapore Research Fellow Nov 2007 – Dec 2007 SUPELEC, Rennes, France Merlion Project Grant Intern Aug 2005 – Jul 2008 Nanyang Technological University, Singapore Teaching Assistant Aug 2003 – Jul 2005 SAINTGITS College of Engineering, Mahatma Gandhi University, India Lecturer
